mpg_modified <- mpg %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    cyl = as_factor(cyl),
    fl = as_factor(fl),
    drv = as_factor(drv),
    class = as_factor(class),
    trans = as_factor(trans)
  )

`.groups` argument.
